Plant hanger: Hang plants from clothes hangers to create a vertical garden.
Bookends: Use clothes hangers as bookends by attaching them to the page edges of books.
Chair back rest: Hang clothes hangers over chair backs to provide additional support for leaning against.
Jewelry holder: Attach clothes hangers to the inside of a closet door to create a place to hang necklaces and other jewelry.
Key holder: Hang clothes hangers vertically on a wall and use hooks or clips attached to the hangers to hold keys and other small items.
